levels.title: GRANT - Szenario-Zuordnung

pairs.left: Szenario 1: Intern Access The new Intern 'Max' needs to see the product list. He must NOT change anything.

pairs.right: Warum passend 1: Die korrekte Option folgt direkt aus den vorliegenden Informationen.

pairs.left: Szenario 2: Inventory Manager Sarah manages stock. She needs to update prices and add new items. Deletion is for Admins only.

pairs.left: Szenario 3: Audit Mode The Auditor needs full read access to 'Orders'. NO changes allowed!
